Note: Instagram didn’t work on the glasses . It would say “connect the app “ but still would not work. We switched the glasses to pair number 2 ending in 0022 but it still didn’t work.
In troubleshooting, we switched phones and it started working fine. Currently using phone no 9 but switched back to the original pair of glasses ending 001H.

Instagram reels stopped playing at a point. We did a manual reboot of the glasses and the it started to work fine. Prior to that , i disconnected and reconnected the IG app through the glasses twice. It stopped playing the reels and started displaying blank screens . This time , I disconnected and reconnected the app but kept the app open om the phone and them it started to work fine.
